column2: City clusters from your breach list

column3:
Firm inauguration timelines create anticipatory, HNI-led buying . 

Noida: inauguration slated and passenger ops guided shortly after; signage and traffic prep underway. 

Navi Mumbai: opening timeline widely reported, with spillovers amplified by MTHL.

column1: Growth hubs & industrial corridors / SEZs (policy signal)
column3:
Credible master-planning reduces policy risk and pulls capital forward; markets price in future jobs & amenities, with premium formats leading. 

MMRDA Growth Centres approved at Boisar, Virar, Pen (multi-node MMR vision). 

UP Defence Industrial Corridor now ~?33.9k cr proposals across 6 nodes, with units operational—lifting upper-income cohorts in Lucknow/Noida belt. 

DMIC–KBNIR positions Bhiwadi within NCR’s industrial spine.

Nagpur: MIHAN (airport + SEZ + cargo) deepens high-income job base; FY25 exports doubled, signalling real economic pull.

column2: MMR overall; ?1184 sq ft across metros & strong Tier-2s (Kolkata, Chandigarh, Lucknow, Noida)
column3:
2025 saw a budget-mix swing to ?1 cr+; even with softer volumes, value rose as luxury share expanded. 

This reflects wealth effects, status/space preferences, and portfolio reallocation toward larger, amenity-rich units—hence consistent outperformance in ?1184 sq ft.
